subject: Guidelines for procurement of fee collection agencies through competitive bidding system - amendment of clause 3 (vii) of circular no. 122
text: HRd4 <efty 7JTH gferrrut Tant Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (deo 4aett &r TTTAN FTq4) 457 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 717 National Highways Authority of India QF. /Extn:: 2223 2318 , 2488 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7i-5 & 6, #qr-10, ERAT;, #farht 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 NHAI/13013/09-10/Tolling options/ CMD-CONVol. II 23.07.2010 CRRCULAR NQ: NHAICOMMERCIAL OPERARTIONS/23 Sub: Guidelines for procurement of fee collection agencies through Competitive Bidding System- amendment of clause 3 (vii) of circular no: 122. In partial modification to Circular No: NHAl/Commercial Operartions/122 dated 22.06.2010, clause 3 (vii) of the said circular is amended as below: Original clause Amended clause After the award by Competent Authority, PD After the award by Competent Authority, PD concerned its authorized to sign the contract concerned will prepare the contract bond and on behalf of NHAI: send it to CO Division for signing it by the Authorized Signatory of CO Division NHAI HQ, G-5 & 6 Sec-]0 Dwarka New Delhi- 110075. W (JK. Pandey) Chief General Manager (CO) To All PIU s /CMU' s to: 1 All Members/CGMs/CVO. 2. AIL GMs 3. PS to Chairman: 4; Director (Self Employment) Director General Resettlement; Government of India; Ministry of Defence, New Delhi. NHAL New Copy
